description: A nice simple game about setting auction prices just right and planning for the appropriate scoring rounds. This is not Carcassonne 2.0. This is an entirely different game that features tile laying as a mechanic...
Played 1 2-player game. Not enough market choice in 2-player. Would like to play with full player count.

May 2020 Traded to BoardGameCo for 50 points (in part (14 of 50 (104 points minus 90) Blood Rage - Very Good and in part (26 of 50) of Celestia - Excellent and in part of (7 of 50) of Celestia: A Little Help - Very good, box has some wear  and in part of Celestia: Grappling Hook Promo - Excellent and in part (4 of 50) Noxford - ExcellentApprox. $17.50 to $25 trade value.

title: Some great...
description: Some great mechanisms going on here from the hidden bidding to the semi-draft. Just a really nice game.

title: Really am ...
description: Really am enjoying this game+ Easy to learn+ Love bidding/price setting+ One of the most balanced games I have ever played- Art is iffy

title: 2-5 player...
description: 2-5 players, 30-45 minutes, medium light, tile laying/auctionAlthough I was not convinced after my first game, I purchased it after a while and have since played several games with my son (10). Although the auction mechanism works better with more players, we enjoy the game as a 2-player game.Verdict: keeper
